title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd
author: Agatha Christie
description: A revolutionary crime novel by Agatha Christie, featuring Hercule Poirot, who has retired to a quiet village to grow vegetable marrows, only to be drawn into a murder investigation that challenges the very nature of the detective story.
